language.text: The demonstration mode is on. Use login "demo" and password "demo" to enter the control panel.
Website Control Panel - Server compatibility test
Some errors are found while testing your server:
Mail function does not work on your server.
Your PHP version %s is lower than required %s
Consult your hosting provider for assistance.
Maximum upload file size is %s, but %s required
Consult your hosting provider for assistance.
Enable this option or consult your hosting provider for assistance.
You should make this directory writable
You should make this directory readable
You should make this file writable

Please fill in your login information to create a new user account. You will need it to enter the control panel next time. Email address will be used for a new password generation in case you forget it.
If the new window does not open, please turn off the browser's popup blocker for this page and try again.
You can change this information later through the control panel preferences.
Please provide your email address, and we will send you the new login information.
Check your email and try again.
Your login or password is incorrect.

Welcome to the Control Panel. There are few sections to choose from. The Content Management Wizard makes things easier while working with this product for the first time or using it for a quick guide. The WYSIWYG Editor is the most powerful tool to make structure and layout changes. In the Quick Content Editing section you will have access to website elements and dynamic data. Settings, Media Library and Fonts Manager can be accessed from Preferences. Use Help & Support button if you have questions.
Do not show this screen next time.
Create a New Page or Popup
Select the website section to open
Go back to the previous section
Save changes and go back to the previous section
Preview Website with changes applied to it.
Keep Aspect Ratio while transforming objects
Page Url is a string that is added to the website url. It cannot contain other characters than a-z, underscore and "-".
Parent Page - Current page's parent page. This setting affects website pages structure and page's url.
Check this option if you don't want this page to be indexed and added to the search results.
Check this option if you don't want page links to be indexed.
Check this option if you don't want this link to be indexed.
Popup Url is a string that is added to the website url. It cannot contain other characters than a-z, underscore and "-".
If this option is checked, you can use only those fonts that are installed on the system. If the selected font is not installed - the text will disappear.
The objects included in animation usually cannot be moved or deleted.
Some objects have fixed dimensions and can not be resized.
Modify web pages, menus, popups and widgets here..
Use the WYSIWYG editor to modify or create new pages and popups.
Change Website and Control Panel Settings
You can change the website and control panel preferences, update the website media library and fonts here.
Help and Support is just a click away.
Here you can edit the website menus.
You can add new website pages, edit or remove them here.
You can add new website popups, edit or remove them here.
You can edit the website widgets here.
Create a new website page and switch to the editing mode.
Create a new website popup and switch to the editing mode.
You can edit different website settings here.
You can edit the control panel settings and change your login and password here.
Add, edit and remove media assets.
The are two types of website sections - pages and popups. Please choose the one you would like to create.
Please select the type that you would like to create. The default page is created with the sample content but you may also select the 'Create Blank Page' option to create an empty page.
Check this option if you need to create an empty page without any sample content.
Please select the popup type that you would like to create. The default popup is created with the sample content but you may also choose the 'Create Blank Popup' option to create an empty popup.
Check this option if you need to create an empty popup without any sample content.
Please fill in the new page name, title and url. You can also choose the parent page.
Please fill in the new popup name, title and url.
Learn more about our CMS from online lessons and tutorials.
Do you have questions regarding our CMS, please read FAQ.
Please choose the website section to edit:
Are you sure that you want to remove the selected menu item?
The Number of top-level menu items could be limited due to the design or functionality.
Menu depth can be limited to a certain number. It depends on the menu type and the drop down menus support.
The website menus can't be loaded. Please check your website files.
Do you want to save changes?
Are you sure you want to remove the entire page?

This section allows you to edit the website pages. You can check available pages, edit their titles, URLs and the reference. Drag and drop items to make desired order. Use Add New Page Button to create new page and select the placement.
Do you want to save changes?
The page is locked and can not be removed.

This section allows you to edit the website popups. You can check available popups, edit their titles, URLs and the reference. Drag and drop items to make desired order. Use the 'Add New Popup' button to create a new popup and select the placement.
Do you want to save changes?
You can edit the control panel and website preferences, access media library and fonts manager here.
Check this option if you want all template warnings to be shown.
Disable all website sounds except the music player. This option can be disabled if the template doesn't support it.
This option enables tracking additional events from Flash during the website viewing.
Wrong Webmaster Tools verification file name.
Warning! Extended right click menu will disable non-latin characters input.
View the website in the same preview window
By clicking on the Preview Website button for the 1st time, a new preview window will open. All next modifications can be previewed in the same window without opening a new one.
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
Warning: Only the fonts generated by Online Font Creator can be used here.
Please select correct glyphs to avoid fonts with the same name but different unicode ranges from mixing
Do you really want to logout?
Do you want to save changes?
Media library has incorrect data or files.
The control panel configuration has been saved.
Error while updating the website configuration.
The website configuration has been saved.
All the keyboard input and key-related actions are disabled while in full-screen mode.
Wrong service configuration. The widget can work incorrectly.
Do you want to save changes?
Are you sure you want to revert all the changes made?

Error occured while sending mail from your server. The mail function is turned off or doesn't work properly.

Please contact your hosting provider for assistance.
The email has been sent successfully.
Do you want to delete all the data?
The font %s is used as the system font of the control panel.
Heading tags is the simplest way to divide up your document. The main headline is an h1 and subsequent headings are h2 through h6.
The page URL %s is not unique. Changed to %s.
Next URLs have been changed as they are not unique: %s.
Unsupported interface of the loaded widget

Your product is not activated yet.

To activate your control panel, please go to your account by pressing the "Activate" button below and add the IP and the domain of this website.

Your website IP and domain are:

Please restart application once the activation process is completed.

If you see this screen even after the product has been activated please consult your hosting provider and check the IP and domain address you entered.
Your website IP address. It is the same as your computer IP address if you use a local webserver.
Your website domain name. Please write the same domain name used for your product activation in the user account.
This option is disabled in demonstration mode.
Specified start page can not be found. Please check your preferences.
Network Error. Please check your connection.
Error while creating a response on remote server.
Error while reading the incoming data.
Incorrect response while processing the language file.
The language file is not found.
Security error while loading the language file.
The server testing script is not found.
Security error while testing the server.
Incorrect response while testing the server.
Security error while loading the user data.
Error while loading fonts. System can work incorrect.
Error while loading the website configuration.
Error occurred while retrieving your login information. Please check the files you have copied to the server. The mail function should be enabled to complete this operation.
Error occurred while retrieving your data.
Error while saving the website configuration.
Error while saving the user data.
Error while creating the Webmaster Tools verification file. Please check root folder permissions.
Default color for the new object
Keep the data in a separate file. This option reduces the website loading time and makes it possible to create a great number of pages.
This option lets you block the objects from editing them by the users. It is available in the Developer mode only.
Apply filter function to find the necessary page name that fits what has been typed.
The folder is not empty. Do you want to delete its contents?
Upload your logo or style image that will display on visitors' browsers, tabs and when your website is placed in favorites or bookmarked. Use only a 16x16, 32x32 or 64x64 pixel image.

The "Under Construction" mode is a special mode used in case you don't want to show your website visitors if it is not finished or is in maintenance. If the mode is enabled, the "Under Construction" page will appear instead of your website home page, but you will still be able to edit and preview your changes.

This service will help you to easily generate the sitemap. The sitemap is an xml file stored on your server. The sitemaps are created for search engines (for getting good crawl coverage of the pages on your site).
View the website from the start page
If the option is selected, the website preview opens from the start page. Otherwise, the website preview will open the page you are currently editing.
Do you want to remove the content?
Are you sure you want to update the template from this object?
Are you sure you want to update the template from this page?
Are you sure you want to update the template from this widget?
Are you sure you want to update the template from this item?
The widgets content list is updated
Are you sure you want to delete the selected content?
Do you want to save changes?
Error while checking the control panel version.
Error while loading the external widget data.
Error while saving the external widget data.
Error while removing the external widget data.
Error while loading the available widgets content.
Error while saving the widgets content.
Are you sure you want to delete this font? You will need to reload the control panel to see the changes.
As the text is dynamic, you can only change its styles using controls.
New update available. Version: %s update now
This option allows you to make an object as a Guide. Use ALT key to select object again.
It is used for login details recovery. Consult your hosting provider for assistance.

Welcome to the professional flash content management system.

This setup will help you tune up the system. During the setup process you may choose the control panel language, create a new account for the system security and complete the website basic setup.

Please click Next Step to continue.
Manage website fonts. Add custom fonts and check out the language support.
Add new media assets to the library
Manage website fonts using the Fonts Manager. All of the non-system fonts used in the website are loaded at runtime as .swf files. Create your own fonts using our Fonts Creator Widget.
Moto CMS is a revolutionary content management system aimed at Flash developers and designed to simplify the publication of Web content to Flash websites

The control panel is working in demonstration mode. This mode allows you to try all the functionality and product features. You can not save and preview the changes, add files and widgets.

Enjoy Flash website editing with professional CMS!
Are you sure you want to remove the selected item(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected folder?
The folder is not empty. Do you want to delete its contents? Press "YES" to delete all the data or press "NO" to delete folder and move contents to the root.
Fit the image to the window
Type new width of the image and click the "Resize" button to apply changes
Type a new height of the image and click the "Resize" button to apply changes
Apply sepia effect to the image
Apply grayscale effect to the image
Apply negative effect to the image
Only latin letters, numbers and underscore symbols accepted
File with this name already exists. Please choose another one.
Click and drag the mouse over the image to select the cropping area
Save this image as a new image
Please select content from the list or %s <u>Create a New One</u> %s
Drag the slider to change the image rotation angle
Drag this slider to change the red offset of the image
Drag this slider to change the green offset of the image
Drag this slider to change the blue offset of the image
Drag this slider to change brightness of the image
Drag this slider to change contrast of the image
Drag this slider to change hue of the image
Drag this slider to change saturation of the image
Drag this slider to change sharpness of the image
Drag this slider to change blur strength of the image
Drag this slider to change the quality of blur
Drag this slider to change quality of the image after saving
Drag the slider to change image scale
Select this item if you want to save current image variants while resizing
Select the item to restore image to selected state
Size of the image exceeds maximum allowed size. Only resize and crop functions will be available
New size of the image exceeds maximum allowed size (2880 x 2880 px)
Error #1502: Script has executed for longer than the default timeout period of 60 seconds. Please reduce the image size
This limit is enforced by your hosting or server configuration. Please contact your hosting provider to allow larger file sizes to be uploaded to your website.
Please select the website popup that you would like to edit.
Please select the website page that you would like to edit.
The number of items is limited. %s item(s) will be added.
Please fill in the fields below.

This form lets you batch add items. You can use the original items size or resize them. If you select resize, you can set new dimensions and scaling mode. Fill mode will crop the image area with no empty space, and Fit mode will resize to display the whole image. Resized items can be placed in a new folder. You can also select a media file from library for all items. All properties set in this form will be applied to all selected items.
Put resized images into this folder:
Error while creating the image. Out of memory.
Error while saving the output file.
GD Library doesn't support the file format.
Unable to read the source file.
Snapping to objects means that items dragged around will automatically jump to align with the vertices and edge centers of the nearest objects and stage.

Advanced anti-aliasing lets you smooth text so that the edges of characters displayed onscreen look less jagged, which can be particularly helpful when you want to display the text using small text sizes.

"Compress & Preview Website" option will compress XML files to improve the website load time. Please use this option when you have finished editing your website. If you choose "Save" option after "Compress & Preview Website", the compressed files will be replaced by the uncompressed ones.
Error while saving the xml file.
Use this property if you need to set dfferent height for individual pages.
Enable this option to use Flash scrollbar. The browser's default scrollbar will be used if this box is not checked.
The text has just disappeared because this text field uses system font.
This placement is covered by the mask. All objects outside of masked area will not be visible on the website.
All the objects in this placement stick to %s of the website.
This placement covers some area of the website and stretches with the website.
All the objects in this placement will be visible on all pages of the website.
All the objects in this placement will be visible on all pages with current layout.
All the objects in this placement will be visible only on the current page.
All the objects in this placement will be visible only on the current popup.
Enable the non-latin input compatibility mode

Some browsers don't support the non-latin input mode. The enabled option will allow the user to input non-latin symbols. Please note that the "HTML Widget" doesn't support this mode of operation and will be disabled in case of the "non-latin input compatibility mode" is enabled. The widget will be displayed within the control panel, but not on the website. Warning: when this option is enabled, the "HTML Widget" will be disabled. Please refresh the page to activate the updates.
Enable a separate page for non-fans
If you enable this option non-fans will see the image or static HTML code you entered. If you leave, the disabled fans and non-fans will both see your website.
To integrate the website into your Facebook page, you should indicate the "App ID" and "App Secret" of your Facebook application. You can find it in your application's settings by following the link
Add custom HTML code. You can use javascript, CSS styles, and any standard HTML tags.
Your MotoFanPages session has been expired. To enter the control panel please go to the MotoFanPages application and refresh the page (or use the 'Control Panel' link within the application).
If activated a password will be required to view the contents of the page. Click "Set(Change) Password" to create or modify the password.
You have an option to make any page the home page of your website.
Once activated, only your website visitors will see the Under Construction page. This will allow you to continue to view the website while it is in the preview mode.
Select this option to keep your website hidden until you are ready to go it live.
Enter your contact information while your website is under construction. You'll want to make sure to set the font color, size and test this option using the button below.
We recommend using Google Analytics to improve your website ROI and monitor how your traffic is doing.
Activate password protected your website pages and popups.

This option allows you to password protect your pages and popups. Once active, you may set the password and customize the login box style settings. This box will appear on password protected pages and popups.
Please note: The password is the same for all website pages and popups.

Click "Check for updates" to verify your website software is up to date with the latest version.
Important note: please, make sure you have made a backup of your site prior to start with updating it.

By clicking the "Create Backup" button you will be re-directed to the "make a backup" page where you will be allowed to create a backup of your site. The archive with your site's backup files will be stored on your server in the admin/actions/backup/_backups/ folder. In order to restore your backup, you will need to upload the content of this archive to your site's root directory.
Create new content to work with this widget or select existing content from the list.
Please log in to %s in the separate browser window that opened.
Images added to the Media Library will be copied to your web server. Videos will be displayed as one image.

Click "Connect" to allow Flickr to add photos to your Media Library. Note: Images will be uploaded to your website hosting account allowing for proper image management within your website's Media Library.
Error occured while getting user info.
Error occured while getting list of photos.
Error occured while getting list of albums.
Error occured while getting original photo URL.

Click "Connect" to allow Picasa to add photos to your Media Library. Note: images will be uploaded to your website hosting account allowing for proper image management within your website's Media Library.
Error occured while getting the list of photos.
Error occured while getting the list of albums.

Click "Connect" to allow Facebook to add photos to your Media Library. Note: images will be uploaded to your website hosting account allowing for proper image management within your website's Media Library.
Error occured while getting the list of friends.
Error occured while getting the list of photos.
Error occured while getting the list of albums.
Your session has expired. Please connect again.

You can manage widgets here. All of the non-system standard fonts used in the template are loaded at runtime as swf files. If you want to add your font you need to create the font swf file first, you can do this using Fonts Creator Widget on our website.
